one_reviews_text: This game could have been a fun roomscale workout/reflex challenge, but poor design has wasted that potential.   The UI/VR implementation are confusing, and the gameplay modes don't do a good job showcasing what could have been a good amount of solid content.

review_title: Got this for free, 5 star challenge
one_reviews_text: So I got this free as part of the Oculus specials.  I had actually seen it on the steam store and almost pulled the trigger.  I think this is a very good game, but you do need a nice sized roomscale setup and sensors picking up things correctly to do well.  This game will have you weaving, bobbing, jumping, shooting, punching, and sweating with a matter of minutes.  This is not a game for those of you who are out of shape.  This game requires quick reflexes and good peripheral vision.  If you manage to beat this game, you're probably a ninja.  I'm having a hard time just getting past the first few levels :O
